definition: the mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); to pursue a narrow gain while neglecting a greater danger
Beipai Tanglang Quan - "Northern Praying Mantis" (Chinese Martial Art)
Chow Gar - "Southern Praying Mantis" - Martial Art
the mantis stalks the cicada, unaware of the oriole behind (idiom, from Daoist classic Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); to pursue a narrow gain while neglecting a greater danger
pinyin: tang2 lang2 bu3 chan2 , huang2 que4 zai4 hou4

sentences.english: The flower mantids from Africa look like flowers .
sentences.chinese: 非洲的花螳螂就像花朵一樣。

sentences.english: Mantids come in many different colours .
A praying mantis spreads its wings.
sentences.chinese: 一隻螳螂正在伸開它的翅膀。

sentences.english: At this time, saw a mantis sword play, to seize a dragonfly.
sentences.chinese: 這時，只見螳螂一個揮馬刀，把蜻蜓抓住了。

sentences.english: The female praying mantis often eats the male aftertheymate.
sentences.chinese: 雌螳螂在雄螳螂交尾後，經常喫掉對方。

sentences.english: The female praying mantis often eats the male aftertheymate.
sentences.chinese: 雌螳螂在雄螳螂交尾後，經常喫掉對方。

sentences.english: Fighting guard in the Praying Mantis Kung Fu style prepares you for an attack and to counterattack.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥在螳螂拳功夫風格防範準備攻擊你和反擊。

sentences.english: The male praying mantis cannot copulate while its head is attached to its body.
sentences.chinese: 公螳螂腦袋連着身體時無法交尾。

sentences.english: Is a mantis good or bad for farmers?
sentences.chinese: 螳螂對農民是益蟲還是害蟲？

sentences.english: Praying mantids are one of the few insects that can turn their heads.
sentences.chinese: 祈禱螳螂是能扭頭的少數昆蟲中的一種。
嬌虎，靈蛇，仙鶴，猿猴，螳螂。

sentences.english: He dare catch mantis, isn't afraid dirty.
Eggs – Praying mantids survive the winter as eggs, which emerge in spring.
sentences.chinese: 螳螂卵在冬天是不會孵化的，只會等到來年春天。

sentences.english: Dicky Cheung Xiaoyan, "Tang Langquan school, but I have learned a lot ah."
sentences.chinese: 張衛健笑言，“學螳螂拳，我可是獲益良多啊。

sentences.english: The other kind stab their prey with a spikey-tipped arm.
sentences.chinese: 其他種類的螳螂蝦則是用尖矛狀鉗子刺穿獵物。

definition: (literary) beauty (usually of a maid or concubine)
Ox-Head, one of the two guardians of the underworld in Chinese mythology
person/number of people/(per) capita/(a person's) head/(Tw) person whose identity is used by sb else (e.g. to create a bogus account)
Tashu township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
leech/bloodsucking vermin/vampire (translated European notion)/fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers
